DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to design a self-assessment package that could be the preferred option to a follow-up visit at the clinic by the majority of women having early medical abortion.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Low Sensitivity Pregnancy Test for Self-assessment of Medical Abortion
DOC.criteria: 1. Already be signed up to do a medical abortion at this clinic 2. Be willing to come to all clinic appointments and be accessible by phone for 2 weeks after sign up for the study 3. Own a cellphone to which will be sent medical abortionrelated information and messaging. 1. Be doing a medical abortion due to failed natural miscarriage 2. Not have a working cellphone
